archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_1472
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a credit manager, I want to be able to report on everything related to interest free, for example: Credit check results - based on phone/plan/value applied for/customer's history, etc

properties.value: The mechanics of Credit Check are not clear To be discussed. REP: How the required data should be provided on BSS side ? available for user on system screens? database level ? particular report/export ? (if Yes - what format is required/expected ?)

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
